DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to evaluate the effectiveness and the safety of the cyclocoagulation using HIFU in glaucoma patients
DOC.brief_title: Circular Cyclocoagulation Using HIFU With EYEOP1 Device in Glaucoma Patients
DOC.criteria: Primary Openangle glaucoma included pseudoexfoliative glaucoma and pigmentary glaucoma IOP > 21 mm Hg on glaucoma medications, and indicated for filtering glaucoma surgery Patient must be aged 18 years and more No previous cyclophotocoagulation procedure in the eye No previous laser treatment in the eye during the 3 months before HIFU procedure History of previous glaucoma surgery with implantation of glaucoma drainage device in the study eye History of ocular or retrobulbar tumor retinal detachment, choroidal hemorrhage or detachment Ocular infectious diseasee within 14 days before HIFU procedure
